title: Carnival comes to Olinda
caption: Carnival comes to Olinda
desc: It's the first official day of Carnival in Olinda and the streets in the historic part of town will be alive with revellers who come out to see dozens of giant puppets parade through the town. The larger-than-life 'bonecos de Olinda' kick off the festivities each year and have been part of the celebrations here for over a century. They can be up to six metres tall and weigh around 20 kilos each. But Carnival in Olinda is not only about these incredible puppets. Like other popular Carnival celebrations in Brazil, Olinda's features music, dancing, costumes, and fun.
